com.tobedevoured.modelcitizen.policy

Class MappedSingletonPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tobedevoured.modelcitizen.policy.MappedSingletonPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldPolicy, Policy

    public class MappedSingletonPolicy
extends Object
implements FieldPolicy
    Enforce a @Mapped field in a @Blueprint as a Singleton Policy for creating models. If constructed with a Class, the first attempt to set @Mapped instance of Class will use ModelFactory#createModel(Class, false) to create singleton to use for all instances of Class in registered Blueprints. Note: the ModelFactory#createModel(Class,false) will not run any Policy for the creation. If constructed with a Model, the Model will be used for all @Mapped instances of Model's class in registered Blueprints.
